Journal.Title: Zhongguo xue xi chong bing fang zhi za zhi = Chinese journal of schistosomiasis control
Journal.ISOAbbreviation: Zhongguo Xue Xi Chong Bing Fang Zhi Za Zhi

Article.ArticleTitle: [Advances in researches on mechanism of anti-Toxoplasma Chinese herbal medicine].

AbstractText: Toxoplasma gondii is an opportunity cellular parasite, related to the infection of various animals and human beings and severely impairing agriculture and human health. Because of the complexity of T. gondii life cycle, its different biological characteristics, and multifarious pathogenesis, there are no specific treatment and preventive medicines at present. Chinese herbal medicine can balance "yin-yang" and regulate the immunity and its side-effect is slight. Now, it has been a hot topic of the research on effective and secure medicines in anti-toxoplasmosis. This paper summarizes and analyzes the curative effect and mechanism of anti-Toxoplasma Chinese herbal medicine, such as Scutellaria baicalensis, Inontus obliquus polysaccharide, Radix glycyrrhizae, pumpkin seeds, and Semen arecae.
